author: .vbuterin
content: 1. Do we do witness gas accounting by dumb repricing of witness-heavy operations, eg. https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/protocol-changes-to-bound-witness-size/3885 , or do we explicitly charge per byte or per hash?

author: .vbuterin
content: 2. If the latter, do we charge at time the opcode is executed, or do we store it in a counter and charge at the end of transaction execution? In practice, this generally means, how much do we care about preserving the ability for contract A to call contract B without "trusting" B with the ability to cause the entire tx to fail?
